title: Gazebo 1.7.3 - mkqual 1 state.log store.log never ends

content.raw:
After an hour, the mqual didn't finish yet.


```
#!!script

michele@darpaws5:~/qfiles/qual_task_1$ d
Thu May  9 18:13:39 IDT 2013
michele@darpaws5:~/qfiles/qual_task_1$ mkqual.bash 1 state.log score.log
Filtering the Gazebo state log file. This may take many minutes.
If an error message appears, then you should recreate the log file.
Filtering...^C
michele@darpaws5:~/qfiles/qual_task_1$ d
Thu May  9 19:15:52 IDT 2013
```
I tried several times.
The size of the log is:


```
#!!script

michele@darpaws5:~/qfiles/qual_task_1$ ls -l 
total 255544
-rw-rw-r-- 1 michele michele      9428 May  9 17:18 score.log
-rw-rw-r-- 1 michele michele 261657593 May  9 17:18 state.log
michele@darpaws5:~/qfiles/qual_task_1$ 

```
